description: The government unveils plans to turn Adolf Hitler's birthplace into a police station.
title: Adolf Hitler house to be 'neutralised', Austria says
title_page: Adolf Hitler house to be 'neutralised', Austria says - BBC News
maintext: Little marks out the house to suggest it is where the Nazi leader was born. A rock outside which reads "Fascism never again" is to be moved to a museum in the capital Vienna. A local historian however told the BBC that it was very important that the stone should stay in Braunau.
